entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Fog patches before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
